thread.title: Asian Markets Rise as Trade Concerns Ease

author: Robb M. Stewart
title: Asian Markets Rise as Trade Concerns Ease
text:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average was on track to rise for a third consecutive day Thursday, a first for the blue-chip index in more than a month, as some investors temporarily put aside their concerns about trade and bought shares of stocks that have been struggling.
Shares of Boeing and other manufacturing giants led the Dow higher, a sign that investors were less wary of an all-out trade war after the U.S. signaled a willingness to reach a trade compromise with China. Shares of chemicals and mining companies, some of which...
